candidates.why: Exact command identity and the oracle requirement doc points to it; contains the review type model and execution template.
Same family (review) + session-based review patterns + similar tooling chain (Gemini/Qwen/Codex) and artifacts under .workflow/active/<session>.
Same family (review) + multi-dimensional review execution patterns without requiring a session timeline.
Downstream consumer of review findings; useful to align report format/artifact expectations if review results are later auto-fixed.
Closest reusable pattern for discovering/validating a session folder and enumerating expected artifacts under <sessionPath>.

selected.why: Use as the primary oracle for headings and behavioral intent; keep spec non-leaky and treat the file as validation reference.
